name: FRigUnit_PoseGetDelta
doc: Compares two pose caches and compares their values.

PositionThreshold: The delta threshold for a translation / position difference. 0.0 disables position differences.
RotationThreshold: The delta threshold for a rotation difference (in degrees). 0.0 disables rotation differences.
ScaleThreshold: The delta threshold for a scale difference. 0.0 disables scale differences.
CurveThreshold: The delta threshold for curve value difference. 0.0 disables curve differences.
Space: Defines in which space transform deltas should be computed
ItemsToCompare: An optional list of items to compare
